name: RonJohn® TK-10 General Purpose Remover and Cleaner
description: RonJohn® TK-10 General Purpose Remover and Cleaner is a low viscosity, fast evaporating solvent blend formulated to safely clean and remove water-based adhesives, over-spray, and uncured coatings. It is safe for use on metals,wood, fiberglass, concrete, and certain plastics like polyester,polyethylene, and nylon*. With no toxic ingredients, no chlorinated solvents, and a flash point over 100F, RonJohn® TK-10General Purpose is not DOT hazardous by nature of the domestic transportation exemption. It contains no SARA 313 chemicals, no California proposition 65 materials, no Hazardous Air Pollutants, no known carcinogens, is biodegradable, and has only a moderate exposure rating. With only 20% VOC content, it meets the strictest standards for general purpose cleaning solvents and is available for use in all states except for some areas of California.
